name: Dark SpaceUnder
description:
From all corners of the darkness enemies rush towards you. Spot them with your radar. Target and shoot them down.

Choose to play either stages with objectives to reach, or the endless mode.

Stages, complete an objective:

- REACH TARGET SCORE

  • BABY FIRST TEN > 10
  • ONE QUARTER > 25
  • SHADES OF DARKNESS > 50
  • PERFECT SCORE > 73
  • LXXXVI > 86
  • CENTAUR > 100
  • 1001 1001 > 153
  • HE LI O > 237
  • PALINDROMIC PRIME > 737
  • ONE LAST NIGHT > 1000

- SURVIVE WAVES OF ENEMIES

  • THE FIRST WAVE = 1
  • SECOND NATURE = 2
  • END OF LINE = 3
  • (PRIME SAFETY = 5) - will be added later
  • LUCKY DODGE = 7
  • DECIMATION = 10

Endless mode, survive as long as you can and reach the highest score:

  • ENDLESS (SUFFERING) - will be fixed later

How to play? - click/tap into the darkness -> rotate the light; - click/tap on the enemy -> shoot it down.
